src:
Sesi I
IHSG Keok ke Zona Merah di Jeda Siang
04 Nov 2019, 05:22 by Ardan Adhi Chandra


Foto: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - Indeks Harga Saham Gabungan (IHSG) berada di zona negatif siang ini. IHSG melemah 12,4 poin (0,20%) ke 6.194. Nilai tukar dolar Amerika Serikat (AS) terhadap rupiah siang ini berada di level Rp 14.010.Pada pra perdagangan, IHSG naik 11 poin (0,19%) ke 6.219. Indeks LQ45 naik 2,9 poin (0,30%) ke 983.Membuka perdagangan Senin (4/11/2019), IHSG terus naik 21 poin (0,36%) ke level 6.228. Indeks LQ45 naik 4,0 (0,52%) poin ke 985.Jeda siang, IHSG melemah 12,4 poin (0,20%) ke 6.194. Indeks LQ45 juga keok 0,7 poin (0,08%) ke 979.Bursa Asia siang ini bergerak di zona hijau, berikut pergerakannya:

Indeks Nikkei 225 libur
Indeks Hang Seng bertambah 339 poin ke 27.439
Indeks Shanghai naik 21 poin ke 2.980
Indeks Strait Times menguat 4,5 poin ke 3.233


Simak Video "Dolar Tembus Rp 14.200 "

[Gambas:Video 20detik]

(ara/fdl)
text:
Session I
JCI Climbed into the Red Zone at Afternoon Break
Nov 04 2019, 05:22 by Ardan Adhi Chandra


Photo: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - The Composite Stock Price Index (CSPI) is in the negative zone this afternoon. The Jakarta Composite Index weakened 12.4 points (0.20%) to 6,194. The exchange rate of the United States dollar (US) against the rupiah this afternoon was at the level of Rp 14,010. In pre-trade, CSPI rose 11 points (0.19%) to 6,219. The LQ45 index rose 2.9 points (0.30%) to 983. Opened trading Monday (11/04/2019), the JCI continued to rise 21 points (0.36%) to 6,228. The LQ45 index rose 4.0 (0.52%) points to 985. In the afternoon break, the Jakarta Composite Index fell 12.4 points (0.20%) to 6,194. The LQ45 index also fell 0.7 points (0.08%) to 979. The Asian market today moved in the green zone, following its movements:

The Nikkei 225 index is off
The Hang Seng Index added 339 points to 27,439
The Shanghai index rose 21 points to 2,980
The Strait Times Index rose 4.5 points to 3,233


Check out the video "Dollar Penetrates Rp. 14,200"
